titles.title: A resolution entitled "German and Japanese membership in the United Nations Security Council".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9893-9895)
Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 7/29/1993--Introduced. Declares that: (1) the U.S. Government should support German and Japanese permanent membership in the United Nations Security Council; but (2) no action should be taken to further such an initiative until Japan and Germany have taken political action to permit them to discharge the full range of responsibilities attending permanent membership status.
